title: 前苏联生物武器专家Ken Alibek 在 "生物灾难“书中揭露中共军队在东北试验生物战病毒引起泄露导致血热病蔓延
contents:
Biohazard : the chilling true story of the largest covert biological weapons program in the world, told from the inside by the man who ran it / Ken Alibek with Stephen Handelman
On Page 286 :
In northeastern China, satellite photos detected what appeared to be a large fermenting plant and a bio-containment lab close to a nuclear testing ground. Intelligence sources found evidence of two epidemics of
hemorrhagic fever in this area in the late 1980s, where these diseases were previously unknown. Our analysts concluded that they were caused by an accident in a lab where Chinese scientists were weaponizing viral diseases.

生物灾难：由项目负责人亲述的最大规模秘密生物武器研制的可怕实况 ---作者Ken Alibek，1999年出版

该书第286页第4段中部：
在中国东北，卫星照片在一个核试验基地附近发现大型发酵工厂及生物承载实验室。情报来源显示该地区1980年代后期出现两起以前未曾出现过的血热病蔓延。我方分析结论是，这些是由中国科学家进行病毒武器化的试验室发生事故造成的。


该书下载地址： 
https://www.nlm.nih.gov/nichsr/esmallpox/biohazard_alibek.pdf

维基百科关于该书的描述（https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biohazard）：
For the most part, the book's assertions recently have been confirmed by U.S. and other Western microbiological and bioweapons authorities, while site-visiting many of the laboratory and weapons production sites and cataloguing the pathogens.
该书所述大部内容近来已被美国及西方微生物及生物武器当局在实地考察许多试验室及武器生产基地并归档病毒时证实。
